Title: Rally to Emberthal
Description:
Now that the fight is done, you ask me to report in to Emberthal. Does Azurathel expect me to follow her commands?

I think not.

The Ebon Scales answer only to the Earth-Warder. And thus far, I have received no orders from Neltharion.

<Sarkareth glowers.>

Still, I am not blind to the threat these Primalists represent. I am certain I have fought their kind before, and yet...

We will rally to the grounds once my people have recovered. You are dismissed, evoker.
